definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: Hay fever is an affliction which arrives at an early age.
sentences.chinese: 枯草熱是年紀較小時會患的一種病。

sentences.english: The pollen of the weed is the main sensibiligen of hay fever in human.
sentences.chinese: 豚草花粉是人類枯草熱症的主要致敏源。

sentences.english: Rainy weather brings blessed relief to hay fever victims.
sentences.chinese: 雨天會給枯草熱患者帶來欣喜，減輕他們的痛苦。
